Egypt, China stress priority of safety, security of navigation in Red Sea in joint statementEgypt and China are closely following developments in the Red Sea, focusing on the priority of ensuring the safety and security of navigation, they said in a joint statement on Sunday. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 11:37:11 GMT 6XGNZKKO75JQXAEFFDQ7PZ7M6M https://www.reuters.com/world/egypt-china-stress-priority-safety-security-shipping-red-sea-joint-statement-2024-01-14/Reuters世界
Guatemala's Arevalo due to assume presidency with difficult path aheadGuatemalan President-elect Bernardo Arevalo is due to be sworn in Sunday for a four-year term, pledging to banish deep-rooted corruption, though he will come up against a divided Congress and string of judicial attempts to block him from wielding power. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 11:03:10 GMT B2VF2KTVJBOJRIFBB4LERIAEI https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/guatemalas-arevalo-due-to-assume-presidency-with-difficult-path-ahead-2024-01-14/Sofia Menchu世界美洲
Taiwan election a relief for world markets, concern for local investorsTaiwan's election could allay global concerns about the island's relations with China, while prompting a light selloff domestically on Monday as investors worry the result could hinder economic policy. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 08:26:34 GMT JKQAUN67DZNWNODIBN46WIHNKY https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/taiwan-election-relief-world-markets-concern-local-investors-2024-01-14/Tom Westbrook, Ankur Banerjee市场亚洲市场
China's diplomats condemn foreign governments over Taiwan post-election remarksChina's foreign ministry and embassies around the world this weekend warned countries against supporting Taiwan's Democratic Progressive Party (DPP) and condemned foreign governments that congratulated the island's president-elect Lai Ching-te. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 07:56:59 GMT VFDBZ6AZOZLQFFBOOKJKLRQ66HQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/chinese-embassies-condemn-foreign-officials-over-taiwan-post-election-remarks-2024-01-14/Eduardo Baptista世界亚太地区
Former US officials to visit Taiwan for post-election talksTwo former senior U.S. officials will arrive in Taiwan on Sunday for post-election talks and underscore the U.S. government's "longstanding interest" in peace across the Taiwan Strait, the de facto U.S. embassy in Taipei said. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 07:17:29 GMT 2ELEANZDEFN7XMB7YYSXTDHVM4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/former-us-officials-visit-taiwan-post-election-talks-2024-01-14/Reuters世界亚太地区
North Korea's foreign minister to visit Russia - KCNANorth Korea's Foreign Minister Choe Son Hui will visit Russia from January 15 to 17, North Korea's state KCNA news agency said on Sunday. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 07:16:25 GMT PNQJO5WORDFONTNAMEXDWMRMF2QI https://www.reuters.com/world/north-korean-foreign-minister-visits-Russian-kcna-2024-01-14/Reuters世界
China's BYD in talks with Brazil's Sigma Lithium on supply deal -FTChinese electric car-maker BYD has held talks with Brazil's Sigma Lithium over a possible supply agreement, joint venture or acquisition, the Financial Times reported on Sunday. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 06:56:18 GMT E4RKGTRTK5N65CYQEVFKI6F2PU https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/chinas-bid-talks-with-brazil-sigma-lithium-supply-deal-ft-2024-01-14/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Taiwan's new president faces tough time with China pressure, no majorityLai Ching-te won by a comfortable margin though with less than half the vote, but his party lost control of parliament on which the president-elect will have to rely to pass legislation and spending. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 06:20:44 GMT 4A5R4DRA35MQDDNS4FYVJJUTNM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-new-president-faces-tough-time-with-china-Pressure-no-parliament-2024-01-14/Yimou Lee, Sarah Wu, James Pomfret世界亚太地区
North Korea fires missile, minister to visit Russia as tensions riseNorth Korea has stepped up pressure on Seoul in recent weeks, declaring it the "principal enemy", and vowing to enhance its ability to deliver a nuclear strike on the U.S. and America's allies in the Pacific. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 06:06:27 GMT M5D7UYHSJZOYXM2BLG2S3XB6OY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-fires-missile-south-korea-says-2024-01-14/Ju-Min Park, Makiko Yamazaki世界亚太地区
China opposes Japan's congratulatory message to Taiwan president-electThe Chinese embassy in Japan said on Sunday that it "resolutely opposed" Japanese Foreign Minister Yoko Kamikawa's statement congratulating Taiwan's new president-elect Lai Ching-te. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 04:19:52 GMT 5VL3BZEA4BKTTN5NDUXAAQ7WT4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-opposes-japan-congratulatory-message-taiwan-president-elect-2024-01-14/Reuters世界亚太地区
Lai Ching-te, Taiwan's new president-elect, will face China's ireLai repeatedly said during the campaign that he wanted to keep the status quo with China, and offered to talk to Beijing. But in Beijing's view, he is a separatist and a "troublemaker through and through." Sat, 13 Jan 2024 13:18:27 GMT 3KBOGC3XAZJUZIO6Z2Q3LZZI3M https://www.reuters.com/world/china/taiwan-president-elect-lai-face-china-ire-after-victory-2024-01-13/Ben Blanchard世界中国
